chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: Semantic Tags are for browsers and web crawlers who want to understand your website properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: They tell them what is the content of your website and what is the purpose of which place and which tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: If you don't use Semantic Tags in HTML, then your work will be done.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: It's not like if you don't use Semantic Tags, then your website won't look good.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: You can do a good design, but we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And if we explain them about our website, then they will be able to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, and their respective search engines.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And we want the crawlers to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And we want whoever wants to understand our website to understand it well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: That's why there are some special tags like header, nav, main, article, figure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: All these special tags are made in HTML, which help you to structure your website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: Now if there is something in the header, then I know that it is header, that is, it is at the top.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: If there is something in the footer, then I will understand that the website has started ending from here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: This footer started here. This footer could have been div, but no.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: If I am using Semantic HTML, then I will use the footer tag.

chunks.text: Along with that, where I was making my navigation bar in the span tag,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: this time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag, I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: So these kinds of differences explain our search engines very well about what our website is about.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: So I will show you some examples of semantic tags here.
